name: Iron League
description: Behold the clash of heroes! Iron League is a MOBA teamfight of the warriors named "Ironsides". The League does not care what their motives are, as long as they give a good fight. How about you? Do you wanna be the strongest Ironside? Then, take a bold step into the Iron League!
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsXP SP3 Processor: 2GHz processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GT 530 / Radeon HD 7540D or equivalent video card DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Supported
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows & or greater Processor: 3 GHz processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GT 730 / Radeon HD 5750 or equivalent video card DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Supported
